text:
The Smart Nation & Digital
Government Group was created
to lead the
digital transformation of Singapore,

and to really create a Smart
Nation out of it.
We knew that we need to move forward,
we need to democratise technology.

And the more we can move to
the cloud, the more we're able

to use things like artificial
intelligence, software

as a service - leverage on
really a thriving ecosystem

of software that's coming on
stream literally every day.

This is where I think the
collaboration between
our team in Singapore
and AWS was really a partnership.
It wasn't just about taking a product,
it was about working together with a team
of world-class professionals.
And that's how the idea
of a AWS Dedicated Local Zone came into place.

We kind of started the journey
by really asking ourselves

what would make us
feel comfortable enough
to move these sensitive

and mission critical workloads
onto the commercial cloud?

And that was really
the start of the design
of AWS Dedicated Local Zones.
It really allows us to get out there

and do things that we never
could have done before.

That's really one of the
most important
things about innovating on the cloud.
